solution.text:
Let the number be x.
According to the question, y=z,
Hence, (x+_{j}_)=_{k}_(x-_{j}_)
_{{k-1}}_x=_{j}_(_{{k+1}}_)
x= \( \frac{_{j}_(_{{k+1}}_)}{_{{k-1}}_}\)
\( \Rightarrow \) x=_{{trunc(Decimal(j)*(k+1)/(k-1),2)}}_

content.text: Adi thinks of a number x and adds _{j}_ to it to get y. He then takes another number z which is _{k}_ times the difference between x and _{j}_.He sees that y and z are equal. What is the number x ?
